content.detailedDescription: (you can type over theseinstructions.)please limit your narrative to 500 words (equivalent to 1 typedpage). several lights appeared over the southern end of the largest lake intuxedo (there are 3) there is not a air lane at this location, and with theexception of the rare military plane from stewart or west point no traffic.Lights kept appearing (blink on) travel towards the east, stop and double back.When i saw the 1st one it was unusual however by the 5th or 6th it wasremarkable. cant say for sure what it was, other then out of the ordinary.
content.summary: Tuxedo park ny, several unexplained erratic lights

content.detailedDescription: Susann and a friend were driving back from getting a large roll of hay for herhorses.  they were driving south on red bank road twards virgilina va and sawmoving north towards them a silver disk shaped object.  it was approx. 5,000 fthigh, they at first thought it may be a jet, but there was no contrails, it wasa clear blue sky day.  they saw it moving north for about three seconds then itvanished3b it appeared to be moving faster than a jet.  they said if the sun would nothave shined off of it they would not have seen it. this report completed by tomginther, va mufon
content.summary: Silver disk
Sat under a ufo for about 30 minutes in 1972

content.detailedDescription: Driving approx.25 miles so. of the object driving from east to west then turningnorth.The lights were bright and appeared brighter then any city lights.Thelight was rectangular with lights in thte center being slightly duller then the2 larger lights pulsating on either side of the object.It hovered in the air forapprox. 30 min.Unfortunately we were unable tpo follow the object at this time.Please limit your narrative to 500 words (equivalent to 1 typed page).
content.summary: Large rectagular light with 2 large lights on eith

content.detailedDescription: I will do my best to give the description of my encounter.This would have been around 1980. my family was living in alabama, and a friendof mine had invited me to go to the ft walton, fl area camping with her family. we stayed in a koa camp ground.  her parents stayed in a small pop-up camper andmy friends father had set up a tent (one you could see all the way around)rightin front of the camper. i can remember we cut our camping trip short due to ahurricane forming. the one day we went to the beach the ocean was very rough andthere were a lot of dead fish on the beach. (unusual weather conditions)  thatnight, it had yo be 1:00 to 2:00 am i woke up in the tent, and sat straight uplooking at the most incredible sight i have ever seen. the "football" shapedobject was hovering over the distant treeline of pine trees. it was glowinggold....And in the center was a round circle that was even golder. it lookedlike a huge eye.....I remember thinking.  i watched it and it moved along thetreeline, no sounds. i tried waking up one of the girls camping with us and sheonly saw it (sleepy eyed)for a split second and it vanished. i actually watchedthis object 5-6 min. the next morning i did tell my friends parents.I have told this story all of my life whenever "sightings"are talked about. itwas the most incredible sight!! as i have grown older i have yet to be abe tologically to explain what i saw, but ill never forget it, and can close my eyesand see it plain as day! i am glad to be able to finally be able to report thisto sighting to the proper organization. thank you!
content.summary: Ufo siting in 1980, ft  walton beach area.

content.summary: U

content.detailedDescription: 1-getting a driving lesson in my brothers car on a dirt road n.Of subdivisionin bloomington mn,foresthaven suburb division.  2- we stopped to look west tosee the sunset. 3-lense/ovalshaped clouds on horizon 502b miles away,sun a 1/4 visible due to the hills a 1/2mi away.  5- seeing lightcumulus and standing lenticular clouds, one of the clouds started moving. beforeor after, a large bird almost condor size, launched from the woods in front ofus and flew west.  it looked like a large bat with a beek, we heard its wingsflap.We were calm and standing. q- 5266: two f4 phantoms,full after burners with the  sonic booms from e.Tow.Flewdirectly overhead, 10002bfeet,markings and details easily visible, and they split to intercept. momentsafter the f4s passed our position, the object was already moving n.Tos.I.E.Right to left within our view and then west. it appeared to have a distrailbehind it and left our  view due to hills, f4s also. 4- we stood motionless andemotionless for several minutes.. i didnt know what to do, but wanted tocontinue to observe the rest of the sunset.My brother started his car and saidlets get out of here!!We left26 arrived home late for dinner. was this an incursion of dewline? a soviettu-144? i was a student pilot flying clubwise though couldnt solo til age16.Bro was a mechanicle tech at paper factory.Before26after this incident,have had recurring thoughts of what i thought was achildhood dream  when i was4-5,1964-5,this above incident  happened in 1973. iwill now re-submit my thoughts/experiences from what i believe happened then, in another mufon/form now.
content.summary: Two f-4 phantoms chased it!!!

content.detailedDescription: I was about to fall asleep when i looked out the window to see an unknown objectdo a circle and then head back the way it came. it was viewed in st. norbert at32 villineuve ave. (ive since moved). it might have been explained as afirefly.
content.summary: Sighting in winnipeg

content.detailedDescription: (you can type over theseinstructions.)please limit your narrative to 500 words (equivalent to 1 typedpage). crossing yard from dtrs house, saw big bright light in w sky - far toobig to be star, and no plane could hover in same spot for 45 min. object changedsize and suddenly dropped straight down, we signaled with portable searchlightand object  light changed color from yellow to blu-white to red and back toyellow.  object pulsed, not twinkled. lights alternately brightened and dimmed. watched until object slowly disappeared over western horizon. object seemed tobe v shaped set of lights.
content.summary: Huge light in western sky

content.detailedDescription: This has occurred two saturdays in a row.  the first event there were onlythree, the next week seven small and one huge one.  we were driving south on hwy385 and saw orange flashes of light on the ground, directly above was one of theobjects.  in town, 2 more came closer.  the second week we looked for them everynight, and they came back at dark on saturday.  we then picked up 2 friends tocome watch them with us.  they hover low, then go farther back, move left toright and up and down.  it is frightening, but also exciting.
content.summary: Flashing flying objects
Sighting over rockford,il

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out my window and saw a huge something fall from the sky.  it wasbright red with a blue/white tail.  it was significantly larger than a fallingstar (10x).  i would like to know what it was.
content.summary: Large falling object in east sky above denver.
Bright light low in eastern sky

content.detailedDescription: (you can type over theseinstructions.)please limit your narrative to 500 words (equivalent to 1 typedpage). i was driving home with my almost 8 year old son on hwy 98 from gulfbreeze to navarre, fl, suddenly i noticed two bright white yellow ( buttercolored) elliptical lights, close to each other to my left in the sky. it wasabout 7:50pm, left life center ( rec area) on way home- arrived home 7. i didntwant to look away but had to check the road, there was no fading, shrinking,moving- when i looked back, they were both gone. i felt calm, my son began toask questions, i assured him they were more peaceful/advanced than us and wouldnot harm us. i did not feel fearful but a loving calmness.
content.summary: Sighting of two close , large, lights, white-yello

content.detailedDescription: Narrative from cl investigation report:the witnesses (father and daughter) were driving home from an event thatevening, and had just turned south onto noble ave. n. in brooklyn park, from85th st.  at 7:40 pm, as they were approximately two blocks south of 85th st.,the daughter noticed a large dark object high in the sky, near the moon.  sheobserved it for a second or two.  on seeing the shape of the object close to themoon, she concluded that it was not an ordinary aircraft, and called herfathers attention to it.The father looked up and also observed the object. he described the object asbeing high in the windshield, making it somewhat awkward to look up at it.  hecontinued to look up at the object, and pulled the car over to the edge of theroad (noble ave n.), and they both continued to watch further.  as they watched,the object moved from right to left, with a slight motion to the north (behind)as well.  upon pulling over, both witnesses also observed a small momentaryleftward "twitch" or "jog" in the objects flight path, which then continuedmoving smoothly and slowly on its right-to-left path.  the initial angle of elevation of the object put it at, or slightly above thetop of the windshield.  the object moved slowly from high in the south towardthe east northeast.  both witnesses described the object as passing nearlydirectly overhead.  the father moved his head forward until his nose was nearlytouching the glass, looking straight up through the windshield  he then lookedup through the drivers side window as the object appeared on the left side ofthe car. as they watched, the object moved high overhead, passing nearly directly overtheir car.  they continued to watch the object as it moved off to the east northeast, and receded into the eastern sky. at a point where it was low in theeastern sky, a dark object associated with the lights was visible against adistant group of clouds.  it was still visible low in the east-northeast at the time the father pulled thecar back out onto the road, and they continued toward home.   they bothestimated that they had observed it for approximately one minute.  the flight motion of the object was described as slow, smooth and continuous,with the possible exception of a slight momentary "jog" (to the left a distanceof approximately 2 centimeters at arms length) at the moment in which theypulled to the side of the road.  this was observed by both witnesses. the fatherindicated that at the time he thought that this might have been due to the cartires bumping against the curb.  following the momentary "jog" flight path thencontinued smoothly to the east-northeast.The object was described as triangular, slightly longer than it was wide.  ateach vertex, there was a yellow to amber light (about the color of a flashlightwith the battery depleted), which the father described as being slightly lessthan 10 times the brightness of the brightest visible star.  the lights were adifferent color than those of a commercial aircraft, and the father felt thatthey were dimmer.
content.summary: Brooklyn park, mn triangle ce1 - 05dec2000

content.detailedDescription: Around march of 98 i was watching tv in bed at my studio apt around 9pm26 midnight when a bright flash of light outside my window and my tv receptionflashing on26off a couple of times caught my attention.I went out on my balcony26 observed an oval white light streak across the sky at an incredible rate ofspeed followed by 2 more ovals in formation.All 3 objects seemed to cover anapproximate distance i would say of about 30 miles in less than 2 seconds.
content.summary: White circular lights in the sky
Ufo sighting at the dutchess county fair: august 1

content.detailedDescription: I saw a very unusual aircraft on my way home from work in the evening.3efrom a distance, driving east on indiana 45, i saw a bright yellow light witha white light, not as bright, next to it5bon the same craft5dhovering in the sky.There were tiny red lights on top, none on the belly.As irounded a bend5bbetween bloomington and new unionville, indiana5d i saw that the craft was about 50 feet above treetop and crossing the roadright to left, directly overhead.I pulled off to watch and noticed othervehicles behind me had also done so.There was no noise - i rolled down my windowto listen - nothing.As the craft passed over my car, i got a good look at itagainst night sky light pollution from bloomington - it was triangle-shaped,with a white light in each of the three wing tipsand appeared to be black incolor.A mile or so down the road, the snow looked blown across the road likedrifting. the rest of the roadway was clear.I thought copter at first, until isaw the thing.Not like any i had ever seen.It seemed like when motorists hadpulled off to watch it flew away.
content.summary: Triangular craft seen hovering noislessly over hwy
Bright neon glow early morning in mono township

content.detailedDescription: I saw a vapor trail in the east as i have many times.  this time the trailsappeared very very high.  the trials were very visible but i could not see theplane. i watch these planes all the time and this time i just could not see theplane at all. it was invisible. i called my girl friend out to see if she couldsee the plane and she could not either.  i got my binoculars and still no plane, just the vapor trails coming from nothing visible. the sky was very clear andbright 11 am.  then as i was watching the trails the jet appeared..Bam.  it wasa large 4 engine jet. clear as a bell and off it went.Has anyone had any similarexperiences or are we just going crasy here. i am a helicoper pilot and know fora fact that this was a very strange occurence. i am also a mufon member...Maybethis can be forwared to g. filerplease respond with a possible explanation.Thankyoujim filippi  jimflippy@aol.Com
content.summary: One for g. filer...Vapor trail hi. att. w/no plane

Low flying, low speed object

content.detailedDescription: I saw a red glowing, either a ball or oval shaped object the started south ofthe big dipper and very very slowly moved across the sky until it was east. theobject pulsated inconsistantly. when it got almost completely due east, itseemed to pick up speed and then it went down and blinked on for a bit then offagain inconsistant until it disappeared. several high flying comercial jets wereseen in the area and i could tell the object was either really really high ormoved real slow because the planes flew real fast compared to the object. itmoved real slow like a balloon but seem way to red and bright to be one.
content.summary: Bright red object very slowly moving/going dark an
Fast-light falls out of sky, crashes into mountain

content.detailedDescription: Standing in front of firestation we were talking about a small plane circlingabove the firestation when we noticed a small white light moving from the northlooking about as bright as a satilite. the object then stopped and began to getlarger and the light began to rotate around the outside of the bell shape. thelight was extremely white bright, the small single engine aircraft in the areacircled under the objec twice then left the area. we continued to watch theobject move very slow to the south. when we could not make out the shape wecould still see the very bright light flashing in the distance. the sightinglasted about 10 minutes because the object was moving so very slow. we finallylost sight because of the treeline near the station.
content.summary: Watched black bell shape object with rotating ligh
Ufo, stationary, very visible, gone in instant, po

content.detailedDescription: On december 30, 2000 saturday morning between 8am-8:50am i saw an ufo hooveringin my neighboorhood. i was on the way to work that morning and as i waited formy bus to arrive i turned to my right side and was not prepared for what isaw.The people who also witnessed this said that it must be some governmentballon, because we are so near to miramar. i told them that it is wobblingaround back and forth and making a humming noise i dont think it any kind ofweather balloon! just then it shot out a probe with brite white light andtriangle thing floating around it, circling the aircraft, without a sound. thenit shot out another probe this time blue with a triangle thing on it doing thevery same thing. i knew this could be balloon. everyone that saw this just shutup quick and walked away. i didnt i contacted you folks at mufon.
content.summary: Sighting in san diego-california
